query:
UPDATE v2_job_flow_runtime SET flow_status = jsonb_set(
                        jsonb_set(
                            COALESCE(flow_status, '{}'::jsonb),
                            array[$1],
                            COALESCE(flow_status->$1, '{}'::jsonb)
                        ),
                        array[$1, 'duration_ms'],
                        to_jsonb($2::bigint)
                    ) WHERE id = $3
